(Mestercipo CPU hátlap)
(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d1.5 h19
t2 m d3 h19

yxz
safe-100,10,15
xm
ym

t1
s50
f200

t2

(router nulla)
#h 0,0 d3 z1 c0.05
#h 268,0 d3 z1 c0.05

(nagyolás)
t2

offset21.5,9

c2 = 0.5
z2 = 3.5
print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

(antenna)
#h 4.5,19 d7 z$z2 c$c2
(h 221.8,19 d7 z$z2 c$c2)
(h 221.8,41 d7 z$z2 c$c2)
(h 200.715,41 d7 z$z2 c$c2)
#h 195.715,45 d7 z$z2 c$c2

(ledsor)
x1 = 9
y1 = 4
y2 = add($y1,6.5)

print "x1=$x1"
print "y1=$y1"
print "y2=$y2"

h $x1,$y1 d3 z$z2 c$c2
h $x1,$y2 d3

x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
h $x1,$y2 d3
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3
h $x1,$y2 d3

(reset)
x1 = add($x1,9)
h $x1,$y2 d3

(furatok)


(ethernet wan)
b inline 85.65,10.9 size16.1,16.6 z$z2 c$c2 g1,0.5,0.7

(ethernet lan)
b inline 106.45,11.9 size69.7,15.8 z$z2 c$c2 g1,0.5,0.7

offset0,10.5

(hdmi)
# https://www.datapro.net/drawings/cutouts/hdmi_cutout.pdf
# 14x4.55 belső
hdmi_x = 215.975
hdmi_y = 9.1

hdmi_x2 = add($hdmi_x,2.025)
hdmi_y2 = sub($hdmi_y,1.3)

b inline $hdmi_x,$hdmi_y size15,4 z$z2 c$c g1,0.5,0.7 nl1,1,1,0
b inline $hdmi_x2,$hdmi_y2 size10,1.25 z$z2 c$c g1,0.5,0.7 nl1,0,1,1

(táp)
(h 209.8,9 d9.5 z$z2 c$c2)
tap_x = sub(252.65,19.9,1.25)
#tap_y = sub(21.1,15.5,1.25)
tap_y = sub(40,3.5,1.25)

b inline $tap_x,$tap_y size20,15.4 z$z2 c$c2 g1,0.5,0.7 jg0.6

(hűtő - furatok)
huto_x1 = 200.2
huto_y1 = 20.5
huto_w = 5
huto_h = 5
huto_g = 2

huto_wg = add($huto_w,$huto_g)
huto_hg = add($huto_h,$huto_g)

huto_w2 = div($huto_w,2)
huto_h2 = div($huto_h,2)

hx1 = add($huto_x1,$huto_w2)
hy1 = add($huto_y1,$huto_h2)

hy2 = add($hy1,$huto_hg)
hy3 = add($hy2,$huto_hg)
hy4 = add($hy3,$huto_hg)
hy5 = add($hy4,$huto_hg)

#1
h $hx1,$hy1 d3 z$z2 c$c2
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
h $hx1,$hy3 d3
h $hx1,$hy4 d3
h $hx1,$hy5 d3
#2
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
h $hx1,$hy3 d3
h $hx1,$hy4 d3
h $hx1,$hy5 d3
#3
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
h $hx1,$hy3 d3
h $hx1,$hy4 d3
h $hx1,$hy5 d3
#4
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
h $hx1,$hy3 d3
h $hx1,$hy4 d3
h $hx1,$hy5 d3
#5
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
#h $hx1,$hy3 d3
#h $hx1,$hy4 d3
#h $hx1,$hy5 d3
#6
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
#7
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
#8
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
h $hx1,$hy1 d3
h $hx1,$hy2 d3
#9
#hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
#h $hx1,$hy1 d3
#h $hx1,$hy2 d3
#10
#hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
#h $hx1,$hy1 d3
#h $hx1,$hy2 d3


(simítás)

t1

offset21.5,9

c1 = 1
print "c1=$c1"

f300

(ethernet wan)
b inline 85.65,10.9 size16.1,16.6 z2.9 c$c1 g1,1,0.7 jg0.1

(ethernet lan)
b inline 106.45,11.9 size69.7,15.8 z2.9 c$c1 g1,1,0.7 jg0.1

(ledsor)
x1 = 9
y1 = 4
y2 = add($y1,6.5)

print "x1=$x1"
print "y1=$y1"
print "y2=$y2"

h $x1,$y1 d3 z$z2 c$c2 jg0.1 np
h $x1,$y2 d3 jg0.1 np

x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3 jg0.1 np
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3 jg0.1 np
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3 jg0.1 np
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3 jg0.1 np
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3 jg0.1 np
h $x1,$y2 d3 jg0.1 np
x1 = add($x1,5)
h $x1,$y1 d3 jg0.1 np
h $x1,$y2 d3 jg0.1 np

c1 = 0.1

(reset)
x1 = add($x1,9)
h $x1,$y2 d4 np

(furatok)

(hdmi)
offset0,10.5
b inline $hdmi_x,$hdmi_y size15.05,4.4 z$z2 c$c g1,0.5,0.7 nl1,0,1,1
b inline $hdmi_x2,$hdmi_y2 size10,1.25 z$z2 c$c g1,0.5,0.7 nl1,1,1,0

(hűtő - rács)
#kezdőpont

# 1 rács átmérője 35 db-nál 19,187142857 mm2
hx1 = $huto_x1
hy1 = $huto_y1

hy2 = add($hy1,$huto_hg)
hy3 = add($hy2,$huto_hg)
hy4 = add($hy3,$huto_hg)
hy5 = add($hy4,$huto_hg)


#1
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng z2.9 c$c1
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy3 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy4 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy5 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#2
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy3 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy4 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy5 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#3
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy3 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy4 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy5 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#4
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy3 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy4 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy5 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#5
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#b inline $hx1,$hy3 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#b inline $hx1,$hy4 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#b inline $hx1,$hy5 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#6
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#7
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#8
hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#9
#hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
#b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#10
#hx1 = add($hx1,$huto_wg)
#b inline $hx1,$hy1 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng
#b inline $hx1,$hy2 size$huto_w,$huto_h ng

(táp)
b inline $tap_x,$tap_y size20,15.4 z1.25 c$c1 f200 ng jg1.25
